summary:
3 armors mashed with college robes
Dark Brotherhood armor mashed with iron armor and 3 runed vanilla iron swords
descriptionHtml:
I combined the Dragonbone, Dragonscale and Hide armor with the college robes to make 3 armor cuirasses. I also made a Heavy armor for the Dark Brotherhood
Male only, I think. I'll add more/make it better when I have a break from university.

I've also included 3 runed iron swords.



Do whatever you want with this mod, anything.
author: Ruhanzei
